ygData.subject: Re: Back to the Ark
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson starts up his engine and rolls off slowly from the ramp of the shuttle, with Lord Elder inside his cab.  He wasn t much for burning rubber needlessly,

Tucson starts up his engine and rolls off slowly from the ramp of the shutt=
le, with Lord Elder inside his cab.  He wasn't much for burning rubber need=
lessly, and always took caution instead of wrecklesness when it came to his=
 driving habits.  Right down to signalling a right turn when it came time t=
o turn right, and keeping his speed at a reasonable clip.  When he feels th=
e ground beneath his tires become rough, he shifts into manual gear to acti=
vate his all wheel drive system, and is careful to take it easy through roc=
ky river beds.  Water splashes up over his cab, as does mud.  But it doesn'=
t bother him in the least.

" I wish I could say enjoy the ride, maybe one =
of these days I can. According to my transmitter, we're quite a bit a way f=
rom the Ark.. Estimated arrival time says about three hours...  I wish I co=
uld get there sooner but if I go too fast, I'll kick up dust, and that's a =
dead giveaway.  This way, if I stick to moist ground for most of the journe=
y, and if I can help it, through grassy plains, I may be able to avoid bein=
g seen.  So far I think sticking to water ways is best.  No dust, no prints=
, no scent, no can track."

He continues to buffer his and Lord Elder's sig=
natures so is to appear that they are not even enroute to the Ark.   While =
he travels, he taps into the Ark's com link.

" Kup, I'm sorry I didn't ans=
wer your question earlier, I'd rather tell you in person to not risk any in=
formation getting in the wrong hands.  The less info we put out in the open=
 the better. "

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclon=
us@...> wrote:
>
> > "Gazoontite. Anyway, you can count on us Lord Elder. W=
e promise, we'll watch our backs every step of the way."
> >
> > Quickstrid=
e shakes his head after sneezing.
> >
> > " We won't do anything you wouldn=
't do, Sir. We'll have to move fast though, Lord Perseus probably needs us =
ASAP."
> >
> > Rat Trap opens the hatch door while on Quickstride's back.
>=
 >
> > "Wish us luck guys. We're gonna need it."
> 
> Elder nodded and smil=
ed at Rat Trap and Quickstride. "I wish you
> success, may Primus help both=
 of you." he said as he watched them
> leave. "May he watch over all of us.=
" he said under his breath as he
> turned back to Tuscon."
> 
> > " I think=
 we should leave the shuttle where it is and head toward the Ark on wheels.=
 We can cover more ground that way. Plus, it's been a while since I've done=
 any form of off road driving and if we keep off the main roadways, no one =
will ever suspect that we've gone back to the Ark instead of taking the bai=
t."
> >
> 
> 
> Elder looked at the shuttle thoughtfully, resting a hand on=
 it. "Hmmm"
> he said finally, "That might not be a bad idea." He depressed=
 a few
> controls, trying to lock it down. Of course no lock is perfect.
> =

> He looked back at Tuscon, who had transformed into his vehicular mode al=
ready.
> 
> > He transforms into his SUV mode and opens his door to Lord El=
der.
> >
> > "So who wants shotgun?"
> 
> With one last look back at the sh=
uttle Elder slid into the proffered
> door that Tuscon held open. "Let's go=
. We have a lot of things ahead
> of us."
> 
> OOC: Don't forget, this is m=
illions of years into Earth's past. Not
> only are there no roads, but ever=
ything is completely wild, and you
> get to contend with things like Dinosa=
urs along the way! :)
> 
> Preston
>
